name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Discovery**  

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret continues its tradition of delivering an eclectic lineup, featuring 52 artists spanning a wide array of genres. With strong showings from Electronic (6 acts), Post-punk (5), Hip-Hop (5), and Alternative Rock (4), the festival strikes a balance between cutting-edge sounds and familiar favorites. From the hypnotic beats of techno and house to the raw energy of garage rock and hardcore punk, there’s something for everyone. Notably, the festival offers a platform for niche genres like Afro-psychedelic funk, traditional South African music, and minimal synth, emphasizing its commitment to musical exploration.  

This year’s lineup is a testament to global and cultural diversity, with artists hailing from 16 different countries. While the USA (11) and the Netherlands (10) dominate, acts from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and Tanzania bring an exciting international flavor. Inclusivity is also evident in representation, with 12 artists identifying as people of color and a mix of male (22), female (9), non-binary (1), and mixed-gender (9) acts gracing the stages. This variety ensures a festival experience that reflects a wide range of voices and perspectives.  

Audiences can expect an impressive array of talent with an average artist rating of 7.2 and a significant portion of acts scoring above 8. With Spotify links available for all 52 performers, attendees can explore the lineup in advance and discover new favorites. Best Kept Secret 2026 promises not only to celebrate the best in contemporary music but also to champion underrepresented sounds and stories from around the globe.
